mapper.sql: id, code_no, name_ch, name_en, hs_code, favored_f, affected_f, code_inter, order_num, remark, crt_by, crt_by_name, crt_by_dtm, mdy_by, mdy_by_name, mdy_by_dtm, voided, voided_by, voided_by_name, voided_by_dtm, three_character_code
mapper.update: UPDATE b_country SET is_deleted = 1 ,update_by = #{username}, update_time = now() WHERE id = ${id} AND is_deleted = 0
